import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Container, Jumbotron, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap'; function Home() { const [budget, setBudget] = useState({ name:'', email:'', phone:'', whatsApp:'', msg:'' }); const [response, setResponse] = useState({ formSave: false, type:'', message:'' }); const onChangeInput = e => setBudget({...budget, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
